Meet Stella Cotton

Posted on July 22, 2016

Stella is an emoji enthusiast üçî, that will be flying in from San Francisco where she works as a developer for IndieGoGo.

She has spoken at other great conferences such as RubyConf Australia, RailsConf and she is thrilled to be speaking at RubyConf Colombia next September. Stella is also an active member of the Ruby community, she organizers andconf.io and runs the San Francisco Ruby meetup.

You can follow Stella on GitHub and Twitter.
